Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed

casebody.head_matter:
Paterno v. McGraw, Appellant.
Argued October 4, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Beien and Roberts, JJ.
Harry Alan Gherman, for appellant.
Carl Brandt, with him Brandt, Biester, Brandt & Malone, for appellee.
November 12, 1968:
